channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows Server 2016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Edge (EdgeHTML-based) on Windows Server 2016

item.title: CVE-2019-1237|2024-08-04T18:13:29.645Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge, aka 'Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1138, CVE-2019-1217, CVE-2019-1298, CVE-2019-1300.

item.title: CVE-2019-1356|2024-08-04T18:13:30.491Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Microsoft Edge based on Edge HTML improperly handles objects in memory, aka 'Microsoft Edge based on Edge HTML Information Disclosure Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1298|2024-08-04T18:13:29.910Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge, aka 'Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1138, CVE-2019-1217, CVE-2019-1237, CVE-2019-1300.

item.title: CVE-2019-1413|2024-08-04T18:20:26.883Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists when Microsoft Edge improperly handles extension requests and fails to request host permission for all_urls, aka 'Microsoft Edge Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1138|2024-08-04T18:06:31.738Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the Chakra scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge, aka 'Chakra Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1217, CVE-2019-1237, CVE-2019-1298, CVE-2019-1300.

item.title: CVE-2019-1428|2024-08-04T18:20:27.387Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20edge%20%28edgehtml-based%29%20on%20windows%20server%202016
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in the way that the scripting engine handles objects in memory in Microsoft Edge (HTML-based), aka 'Scripting Engine Memory Corruption Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1426, CVE-2019-1427, CVE-2019-1429.
